page.title: 18A DAY IN MY MUM'S LIFE
page.content: My mum works at home and at the Convalescent Home. This is her day: {7.30-8.00}make breakfast, clean the fire, wake David, make Anne Marie's lunch, wake Anne Marie and take Dad a cup of tea. {8.15-8.30}get dressed, bring the milk in, take Anne Marie to school on the way to work at the Convalescent Home. {9.00-12.30}put on uniform-report to sister to make beds, bath two patients, Tea Break, collect two priests from chapel, serve coffee, help with baths, bring coffee cups and clean the pantry prepare for dinner, serve dinner go home for dinner with Dad. {1.15-5.15}housework, gardening, preparing meal,have tea,wash up. {6.00-8.00}working at the Convalescent Home,serving suppers, clearing away, putting patients to bed. Go home.PHEW!
